name: DivineTimeSkill
0:
”Alexa, ask divine time what is the divine time between July 1, 1981 and today?”
”Alexa, ask divine time how much divine time elapsed between July 4, 1776 and July 20, 1969?”
”Alexa, ask divine time what is the divine time between May 15, 1948 and now?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: divine time
des: According to 2 Peter 3:8, "one day with the Lord is like a thousand years." With this fun skill, you can calculate how much divine time has passed between earthly dates.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
